tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "Today" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "1 Day Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "2 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "3 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "4 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "5 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "6 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.requesterrorCount) as "7 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query:
select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"HH","1h") as "Start Time",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")) as "Today",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")) as "1 Day Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")) as "2 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")) as "3 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")) as "4 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")) as "5 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")) as "6 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.requesterrorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")) as "7 Days Before" 
FROM usersession

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "Today" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "1 Day Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "2 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")

tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "3 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")

tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "4 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")

tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "5 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "6 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as "7 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "Today" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "1 Day Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "2 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "3 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "4 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "5 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "6 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as "7 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")  and useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"HH","1h") as "Start Time",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d") and useraction.name="activate") as "Today",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d") and useraction.name="activate") as "1 Day Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d") and useraction.name="activate") as "2 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d") and useraction.name="activate") as "3 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d") and useraction.name="activate") as "4 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d") and useraction.name="activate") as "5 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d") and useraction.name="activate") as "6 Days Before",CONDITION(count(*),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d") and useraction.name="activate") as "7 Days Before" FROM usersession where useraction.name="activate"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query:
select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"HH","1h") as "Start Time",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")) as "Today",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")) as "1 Day Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")) as "2 Days Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")) as "3 Days Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")) as "4 Days Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")) as "5 Days Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")) as "6 Days Before",
CONDITION(avg(useraction.duration),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")) as "7 Days Before" 
FROM usersession
